datatypeProperties.comment: A pet animal accompanying this guest person.
A specified textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
A document issued by a government, public organization or association to certify a property of a person, entity, process or object.
An allergy notified for this guest person.
A disability notified for this guest person.

An arrival notified for this guest person.
A health indication notified for this guest person.
An experience item preference notified for this guest person.
A way to protect something, such as human beings, animals or environment, from getting infected or becoming ill.
A special question or request for information.
The identifier for the country of residence for this TT party, such as the country in which a person lives or in which a corporation has its place of incorporation.

The code specifying the title of this guest person.

The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.
